name: Pete

services.title: Open to Work
services.description: I am open to software development and coding or design work anywhere in the U.S.

services.title: A.I. Consultation & Prompt Creation
services.description: I help you come up with the best, most effective possible prompts for A.I.

aboutpara: Glad you're here! I'm a proactive problem solver, skilled at crafting innovative solutions. I approach challenges directly, maintaining composure and effectively engaging with others. With a knack for simplifying complexities, I'm deeply passionate about the world of web development. I look forward to sharing its boundless possibilities and insights with you.

resume.description: Well-versed with React, Javascript, and other frameworks.

education.universityPara: A 12-week intensive program focused on gaining technical programming skills in HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, JQuery, Bootstrap, Node Js, MySQL, MongoDB, Express, Handelbars.js & ReactJS
